name: mapbox-gl-compare
description: Swipe and sync between two maps

scripts.start: cp style.css example/style.css && budo example/index.js --serve example/bundle.js --dir example --live
scripts.build: cp style.css dist/mapbox-gl-compare.css && NODE_ENV=production && browserify index.js | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/mapbox-gl-compare.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && browserify -t envify test/index.js | smokestack -b firefox | tap-status

author: Mapbox
